about_the_game:
The Slime Rancher Original Soundtrack II + The Casey Sessions completes your collection with all-new music from every Slime Rancher update since the game originally launched! Enjoy over 70 minutes of music, across a total of 22 tracks, digitally remastered and un-looped, by composer Harry Mack. All tracks are recorded in high-quality mp3 format.

Featured in this album are the “Casey Sessions” - a collection of personal songs played by Casey after reading starmails about Beatrix’s adventures across the Far, Far Range.
detailed_description:
The Slime Rancher Original Soundtrack II + The Casey Sessions completes your collection with all-new music from every Slime Rancher update since the game originally launched! Enjoy over 70 minutes of music, across a total of 22 tracks, digitally remastered and un-looped, by composer Harry Mack. All tracks are recorded in high-quality mp3 format.

Featured in this album are the “Casey Sessions” - a collection of personal songs played by Casey after reading starmails about Beatrix’s adventures across the Far, Far Range.
